empty.title: Your shopping bag is empty.
empty.subtitle: Explore our products by starting to select one of the categories below.

cookie-policy.body: We use cookies to gather data and save your browsing preferences on the site. You have the ability to disable such cookies in your browser settings and remove those already present. We invite you to consult our Privacy and Cookie Policy for further details.

notifier.success:
Request sent successfully,
you will receive a message as soon as the product is available again
notifier.title: If you wish, we can order it for you and let you know when it will be available again
notifier.consentText: With this request, you confirm that you have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0> and consent to the processing of your personal data for marketing purposes.

newsletter.consentText: By subscribing to the newsletter, you confirm that you have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0> and consent to the processing of your personal data for marketing purposes.

checkout.different-address: I want to ship to a different address
checkout.secured: All transactions are secure and encrypted.
checkout.payment-success-body: Your order has been successfully processed. You will soon receive an email with the order details.
checkout.payment-failure-body: It was not possible to complete your order. Please try again later or contact us for more information.

cookies.title: Cookie Preferences
cookies.mandatory-body: Cookies are pieces of information saved in small text files on your browser when you visit a website. These cookies allow the sender to identify your device during the validity period of consent, which is usually one year.
cookies.analytics-body: Other cookies are used to analyze the behavior of visitors and monitor site performance. By accepting these cookies, you help us to improve our website and provide an optimal browsing experience.
cookies.profiling-body: Furthermore, there are cookies that allow Bottega di Sguardi to show you advertisements based on your preferences, in line with the information collected during your navigation. These cookies are set by both us and carefully selected third parties. If you disable these cookies, the ads you will see may be less relevant to your personal interests.
cookies.usage: Cookies to personalize your experience on Bottega di Sguardi
cookies.usage-body: Finally, there are cookies that collect information about how the user uses the site in order to improve its quality, customize its features, and ensure an optimized browsing experience.

completed.title: Registration completed
completed.body: Thank you for registering. You will soon receive an email with the confirmation link to activate your account.

forgot-password.title: Reset password
forgot-password.body: Enter the email associated with your account and you'll be sent a link to reset your password.

completed.title: Warning
completed.body: Please check your email. A password reset link has been sent to you.
